isoorbi: Process Orbitrap Isotopocule Data

Source: R/isoorbi.R
isoorbi-package.Rd

Read and process isotopocule data from an Orbitrap Isotope Solutions mass spectrometer. Citation: Kantnerova et al. (in review).

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/isoverse/isoorbi

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/isoverse/isoorbi/issues
